subtitleNullable: Lights, Camera, Data: Exploring the TMDB Movie Dataset
descriptionNullable:
The Movie Database (TMDB) is one of the most popular and authoritative sources for movie and TV information. It provides an extensive collection of data on over 500,000 movies and TV shows, including titles, release dates, genres, original languages, vote averages, vote counts, popularity scores, overviews, budgets, production companies, taglines, revenues, and runtimes. These features are organized into different columns in this dataset, making it easy to access and analyse. This dataset is ideal for anyone interested in exploring the trends, patterns, and preferences of movie and TV audiences around the world. It can also be used to enhance movie recommendation systems, perform sentiment analysis, or generate creative content. With this dataset, you can discover the secrets behind the success of your favourite movies and TV shows.

The dataset covers a wide range of genres, languages, and countries, offering a rich and diverse perspective on the global entertainment industry. It has 9500+ unique titles.
title: 9500+ Popular Movies TMDB
